articles.title: Amanda Knox: 'Going to keep fighting' after slander reconviction - BBC.com
articles.description: Amanda Knox says she is "determined to keep fighting" after a Florence court re-convicted her for slander.
articles.content:
Amanda Knox said she is "tired" and feels "victim blamed" after a Florence court re-convicted her for slander in a case connected to the 2007 murder of her British roommate.

articles.title: Antidepressant withdrawal affects one in six people - BBC.com
articles.description: One in six people have symptoms stopping antidepressants - fewer than previously thought, a review suggests.
articles.content:
